alert.note: Alert for Butler; Colfax; Dodge; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 9:41AM CDT until September 23 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Dodge County in east central Nebraska... Northeastern Butler County in east central Nebraska... Northwestern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 941 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Richland, or 9 miles east of Columbus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball sized hail in Columbus at 925 AM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Schuyler, Octavia, Linwood, Richland, Abie, Rogers, and Fishers Elementary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
